thread.title: Watch: LeBron James' insane 3-pointer sent game to OT
thread.title_full: Watch: LeBron James' insane 3-pointer sent game to OT

author: For The Win
title: Watch: LeBron James' insane 3-pointer sent game to OT
text:
LeBron James hit the best shot of the year to send the game into OT LeBron James hit the best shot of the year to send the game into OT By Nina Mandell February 6, 2017 10:27 pm Follow @ninamandell And then Kyrie Irving came up pretty clutch. shares Follow @ninamandell 
But did he call bank? 
LeBron James hit a circus shot to send the Cavaliers-Wizards game into overtime on Monday night in Washington: 
— Cleveland Cavaliers (@cavs) February 7, 2017 
It was enough to make the game an instant classic, but then came this moment from Kyrie Irving in overtime: Oh it's Uncle time! Kyrie's clutch three! @NBAonTNT #DefendTheLand pic.twitter.com/DDth1PJYOh 
One more time on that one: KYRIE WITH THE SHOT. pic.twitter.com/5MzYi3HLSD 
— Cleveland Cavaliers (@cavs) February 7, 2017 
And, well, that’s it for the Wizards. #GameOfTheYear @cavs snap @WashWizards 17 game home winning streak in 140-135 overtime THRILLER! 
Love: 39/12
